donuts.name: Vanilla Glaze
donuts.des: Doe's own hand crafted holey donut topped with a vanilla bean glaze

donuts.name: WhiteChocolateRaspberry
donuts.des: Doe's own handcrafted holey donut glazed with white chocolate ganache and topped with crushed freeze dried raspberries

donuts.name: cinamon sugar
donuts.des: Ye old faithful - Doe's own handcrafted holey donut dunked in a delicious mix of cinnamon and sugar

donuts.name: jam & cream
donuts.des: Doe's own handcrafted solid donut filled with mascarpone vanilla cream and berry jam, rolled in cinnamon sugar, and sprinkled with freeze-dried raspberries

donuts.name: tiramisu
donuts.des: Doe's own handcrafted solid donut filled with mascarpone coffee cream, topped with a lady finger and toasted almonds, and dusted with cocoa powder

donuts.name: Russian Fudge
donuts.des: Doe's own handcrafted solid donut filled with a salted caramel white chocolate ganache, rolled in cinnamon sugar.

donuts.name: tropical
donuts.des: Doe's own handcrafted solid donut filled with passionfruit mascarpone cream dipped in a mango glaze and topped with passionfruit coulis and coconut.

donuts.name: Peppermint Choc
donuts.des: Doe's own handcrafted solid donut filled with peppermint mascarpone cream with chocolate chunks and dipped in chocolate ganache.

donuts.name: Afghan
donuts.des: The kiwi classic - a delicious dark chocolate and cornflake biscuit topped with buttery chocolate icing and candied walnuts

donuts.name: Brown Butter Dark Chocolate
donuts.des: Crispy on the outside with a satisfyingly thick and soft centre, this cookie is made with a rich dark brown butter and packed with Whittikars dark chocolate and sprinkled with sea salt.

donuts.name: Choc Chip Cookie
donuts.des: Crispy on the outside with a satisfyingly thick and soft centre, this cookie is jam packed with Whittakers creamy milk chocolate and 52% dark block chocolate.

donuts.name: Pashghan
donuts.des: When an afghan meets a melting moment it created a Pashghan.Shortbread biscuit with cornflakes and passionfruit icing.

donuts.name: Chocolate Ganache
donuts.des: Doe's signature handcrafted holey donut coated in dark chocolate ganache

donuts.name: White Choc Chip Macadamia Cookie
donuts.des: Crispy on the outside with a satisfyingly thick and soft centre, this cookie is jam packed with white chocolate chips and pieces of macadamia, and sprinkled with sea salt.
